body_html:
Try running
pip uninstall tensorflow
And then
pip install tensorflow==1.5

EDIT
just to give credit, solution is from here:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49094597/illegal-instruction-core-dumped-after-running-import-tensorflow

body:
Try running
pip uninstall tensorflow
And then
pip install tensorflow==1.5

EDIT
just to give credit, solution is from here:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49094597/illegal-instruction-core-dumped-after-running-import-tensorflow
